captions.text: (Operation: Haircut) [M] This is the Spudgy.

Spudgy is a very happy dog right now. He's 
 also a very fluffy dog right now.

Little does Spudgy know, he is on his way to 
 the dog hair saloon.
(What!?)
[Spudgy roars] Noooooooooo!!!!!!
[M] That's right, Spudgy is getting his very first Korean haircut
and style. (Where can I hide?)
(Spudgy's Hair History) (Marching band music)
(Boot Camp Spudgy)
(Clean-cut Spudgy)
(Rebellious Spudgy)
(Arctic Spudgy)
(Hippie Spudgy) (Marching band music ends)
(Long laugh) (The never-ending Spuuudggy!)

(What you are watching is Top Secret material.
(Commence Super Secret Spy music)
Commencing Operation Dragon 09,
Subject: Spudgy/ male/ 4 years old,
Location: Cozy Animal Clinic,
Time: 17:00 hours. Subject successfully captured.)

(Repeat the word time, many times) (Nooooooooo!!!
I've been owned!) (Spudgy roars)
(2 Hours Later! Yes, it took that long.)
[S] You see, I came here to get a Spudgy.
Instead I got this other dog who's agressively begging for affection.
Can I have my dog back?
(Secret Agent Dog) (Super Secret Spy music is louder again!)
(Realizes he's been discovered.)
(Introducing the new Spudgy!) (Punk Rock music)
(Punk Rock Spudy)
(Singing) The chorus is waiting the back.
Oh, don't slip. Ready for attack.
The melody stop.  The melody stop. The melody stop.
[S] Our dog is so much cooler than your dog!
(I hate you guys.) (Singing: Waiting in the back. I got your number)
[S] Oh, Spudgy, Spudgy boy. (Ok, I forgive you.)
(Korean Cultural Education. Brought to you by:)
[Voice 1] What would you like to wish for next?
[Voice 2] I wish Eat Your Kimchi Updated everyday!
(Voice 1 laughs!) (Thanks for watching Spudgy from EYK!)

comments.author: chingou333

comments.text:
If you'd paid any attention to EYK, you would know this: 1) This dye is not 
permanent. It's vegetable based, contains no bleach or chemicals and washes 
off when in contact with water. 2) Spudgy is on medication 24/7 and 
somewhat physically disabled. He can't exactly take care of his own fur and 
needs to be groomed. We can't have him tripping over his own fur. 3) I'm 
thinking about going for a partial buzz cut and brown hair dye. Is that 
human abuse?
